@El_Seguidor_FCB @rimmerjourno Correct
@fatshez I think you’ll find that Fife isn’t a country

@jamieszymko Not Brexity at all, just frustration at those who say they won’t support independence unless it exactly matches their view of the world. I support independence and the people of Scotland choosing the governments and the future they want even if it doesn’t match my view
@El_Seguidor_FCB We all have our views about what should happen, that’s normal. None of it is achievable without independence

If you want an independent Scotland; 1 In or out of the EU 2 In EFTA 3 The Norway or the Swiss model 4 In, out, half way in or out of the single market & customs union 5 The Pound, Scottish currency or Euro
Get independence first and then Scotland can decide its own future
